entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late this morning. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning early in the morning. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind east 30 km/h. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
